description: Manage a web app's connection strings.

commands.name: az webapp config connection-string delete
commands.summary: Delete a web app's connection strings.
examples: az webapp config connection-string delete --name MyWebApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --setting-names {setting-names}

commands.name: az webapp config connection-string list
commands.summary: Get a web app's connection strings.
examples: az webapp config connection-string list --name MyWebapp --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az webapp config connection-string set
commands.summary: Update a web app's connection strings.
commands.syntax:
az webapp config connection-string set [--connection-string-type {ApiHub, Custom, DocDb, EventHub, MySql, NotificationHub, PostgreSQL, RedisCache, SQLAzure, SQLServer, ServiceBus}]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--name]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--settings]
                                       [--slot]
                                       [--slot-settings]
                                       [--subscription]
examples:
az webapp config connection-string set -g MyResourceGroup -n MyUniqueApp -t mysql \
    --settings mysql1='Server=myServer;Database=myDB;Uid=myUser;Pwd=myPwd;'
